name: @vue-storefront/bigcommerce-open-api-sdk
description: TypeScript definitions && Axios client for Big Commerce Webservices

scripts.generate-sdk: npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://gdm-tvpage.demo.hybris.com/rest/v2/api-docs -g typescript-axios -o src --skip-validate-spec && yarn build
